alert.note: Alert for Camp; Cherokee; Gregg; Smith; Upshur; Wood (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 12 at 1:53AM CST by NWS Shreveport
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT SMITH...FRANKLIN...WOOD... UPSHUR...SOUTHERN MORRIS...CENTRAL TITUS...CAMP...WEST CENTRAL GREGG AND NORTHWESTERN CHEROKEE COUNTIES THROUGH 300 AM CST... At 153 AM CST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Como to near Canton to Richland-Chambers Reservoir. Movement was east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Tyler, Mount Pleasant, Jacksonville, Whitehouse, Gladewater, Gilmer, Mineola, Pittsburg, Winnsboro, Leesburg, Lindale, Mount Vernon, Bullard, Troup, Quitman, Naples, Big Sandy, Hawkins, Omaha, and Arp. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 400 AM CST for northeastern Texas.

area.areaDesc: Camp; Cherokee; Gregg; Smith; Upshur; Wood
